thought: I have observed that the website https://finestel.com/ offers crypto trading software development services, copy trading, and white label solutions. It also provides information about its services, pricing, customer testimonials, and frequently asked questions. There is no indication of unusually low prices, claims of free money, or non-existent companies. The content does not target human psychological weaknesses and the website appears to be professionally designed. The information provided is up to date and the website uses common payment methods. Based on this analysis, the website does not exhibit characteristics of a scam website. {
